column4: I'm considering upgrading my install of Dapper to Edgy using the "$ gksu "update-manager -c"" method - is it worth the risk?
what do you intend to obtain by upgrading?
I just want my OS to be up to date
use sudo aptitude update&&sudo aptitude dist-upgrade to be up to date. If everything works, and you are afraid, there is no need to upgrade.
